name: Dragon Breath
description: You release a powerful breath of energy in a 40 foot cone. All targets caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 1d10 + MOVE dragon damage on a fail, and half as much on a save. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is paralyzed.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles the last Pok√©mon to act before the user.
